title: The Ten Best Smartphones On The Market Today
summary: The Samsung Galaxy S7 is one of the best smartphones we have ever seen. It’s an excellent choice for both business and personal use. The iPhone 7 Plus is the perfect device for just about anyone. The BlackBerry KeyOne is a stunning design, excellent sound quality and lots of useful and convenient features. The Google Pixel is the best smartphone we’ve ever tested. The Moto Z Droid is the most expensive smartphone we have tested, but is also well worth checking out.

intro.compiledSource: const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,"Smartphones are a big part of our lives. They help us stay in touch with friends, family and colleagues; they give us access to the internet wherever we go; and they even let us take photos and videos of things that would otherwise be forgotten forever. Smartphones are everywhere these days, which makes choosing one a little challenging. There are so many different brands, operating systems, features, languages, etc. that it can all be quite overwhelming. Thankfully, there are plenty of great options out there today no matter your specific needs and preferences. If you\u2019re looking for the best smartphone on the market today, this article is for you. In it we list some of the most popular devices available as well as some up-and-coming models worth keeping an eye on. Let\u2019s take a look at our top ten picks for the best smartphones on the market today"))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: Making Apple Inc Great Again: How to Make the Most of Your Apple Device

intro.compiledSource: const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...o}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...o,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,"Today, just about everyone has a smartphone. If you\u2019re reading this blog right now, chances are you do too. But how much do you know about the phone you carry around with you everywhere? There\u2019s a lot of information out there on Apple Inc and its products, but not all of it is useful. Let\u2019s be honest: When was the last time you used an Apple device to learn about the company itself? Probably never. The tricky thing about having so many devices from one company is that it can be hard to find information that applies directly to each device as an individual unit. That\u2019s why we\u2019ve compiled this guide - to show you how to make the most of your Apple device by accessing its hidden features, customizing it to fit your needs, and keeping track of everything important in one place."))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: Smartphone Usage Statistics That You Need to Know
The Impact of AI on the Workforce

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...o}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...o,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Advancements in artificial intelligence (AI) are raising concerns about the effect on the workforce. Many people fear that AI will replace human workers rather than simply complement their work.
AI-enabled processes are eliminating some jobs and creating others. The result is a transformation of the entire labor market, not just specific industries. The adoption of AI is also opening up opportunities for new business models and cooperation between humans and machines to tackle complex problems. This article discusses how AI will affect the future of work, describe various roles that will be created or become irrelevant as a result of AI, and provide tips on how you can thrive in this new world of work.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Future of AI: How AI Will Shape Our World in the Next Ten Years
Top 10 Mistakes Macbook Pro Owners Make

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:o,...e}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...e,components:o,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Macbook Pros are fantastic laptops, but that doesn\u2019t mean they can\u2019t be improved. The Macbook Pro is a computer that has been iterated on for many years now. It is also a computer that has gained popularity for being the go-to laptop for video editors and other professionals who rely on the performance of their computer when it comes to editing video or images, like photographers. This article will go into detail about some of the most common mistakes Macbook Pro owners make with their machine and how you can avoid making these same mistakes yourself if you own one.
With so many different versions of the Macbook Pro available on the market right now, it\u2019s easy to get confused about which features you need as an owner of this device and which ones you don\u2019t. Here are some tips and tricks to keep in mind if you own a Macbook Pro:`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: How Big Tech Is Changing the Way We Live and Work

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...o}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...o,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Millennials are now the largest generation of workers in the U.S., and as they advance their careers, they\u2019ll continue to reshape how and where we work. The digital age has made it possible for people to work from virtually anywhere at any time. As a result, more people are leaving the office behind and working remotely or taking up independent contracting gigs, which is why we\u2019re seeing so many young professionals ditch cubicles for coffee shops and other remote-friendly offices.
Working from home, going independent, or collaborating with coworkers online means millennials have given rise to what some have called \u201Cthe gig economy.\u201D It\u2019s also prompted a shift in the types of companies people choose to work for and what skills they need to get hired in those roles \u2014 regardless of where they do that work. If you\u2019re looking to join this world of work in 2020, here\u2019s everything you need to know:`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: 3 Reasons Why Your Macbook Pro May Be Lying to You

intro.compiledSource: const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,"In recent years, Apple has become known for its beautiful designs and attention to detail. This is particularly true of the company\u2019s laptop offerings, like the MacBook Pro. These computers are sleek, powerful, and packed with features that make them stand out from their Windows-based competitors. But as great as these features may be on paper, not all Macbook Pros are created equal. Even if you get a high-end model with all of the bells and whisters that you want and need, it won\u2019t last forever. Even the sturdiest of laptops will break down eventually. What\u2019s important is how well equipped you are to handle these breakdowns when they happen. If your computer starts acting weird or giving you red flags about its performance, it\u2019s probably time to take action sooner rather than later. Here are 3 reasons why your Macbook Pro may be lying to you:"))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: Top 12 Amazingly Low-Cost Macbook Pro Alternatives
Facebook's User Data: How the Social Media Giant Collects and Sells Our Information

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...o}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...o,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Social media is a double-edged sword. While these platforms can be wonderful tools for keeping in touch with friends and family, they also come with risks \u2014 especially when it comes to your personal data. Facebook users can now read again and again how their data was misused by the company and its partners. There are constant scandals around this subject. Social media users need to be more conscious about what they share and how they share it.
Unfortunately, most of us don\u2019t read user agreements or privacy policies until something goes wrong\u2014and that\u2019s too bad, because those documents often contain important information about how your personal information is going to be used by that service provider. In many cases, you\u2019ll see an \u201COK\u201D button beside the user agreement, meaning you must agree to continue using the app or site if you want to proceed any further.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;
